arts.ttl: Alonso: FIFA investigating alleged racist abuse towards Real Madrid's Rudiger
arts.sum: Antonio Rudiger was allegedly racially abused during Real Madrid's Club World Cup victory over Mexican side Pachuca on Sunday, manager Xabi Alonso said.

arts.ttl: Mbappe, Rudiger decisions made as Real Madrid reveal squad for Pachuca battle
arts.sum: Real Madrid will again be missing Kylian Mbappe for Sunday's Club World Cup contest against Pachuca, but Antonio Rudiger is back in the squad.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid vs. Pachuca: Preview, Predictions and Lineups
arts.sum: Both Real Madrid and Pachuca failed to kick off their respective campaigns in the United States with a victory. Six months after Real Madrid and Pachuca clashed in the FIFA Intercontinental Cup final, the two clubs are set to meet again in the FIFA Club World Cup.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid vs Pachuca: Official Squad Announced For Club World Cup Game
arts.sum: Real Madrid Squad vs Pachuca: The game is expected to be played in severe heat once again, so changes could be made.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid vs Pachuca: Odds and Prediction
arts.sum: Los Blancos managed a point in game 1 of Group H, drawing 1-1 with Saudi Pro League team Al-Hilal. Real Madrid appeared to be a team that was figuring things out under new head coach Xabi Alonso.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid vs Pachuca: Predicted Lineup for Club World Cup Match
arts.sum: Real Madrid's 2025 FIFA Club World Cup campaign continues when they face Mexican side Pachuca on Sunday, and Xabi Alonso must decide what starting lineup will give him the best chance of getting his first win as coach. New signings Dean Huijsen and Trent Alexander-Arnold were both chosen to start the match against Al Hilal, and there is every reason to think that Alonso will stick with the same personnel, given that plenty of players are still out injured.

arts.ttl: Official: One return as Real Madrid name squad to face Pachuca
arts.sum: La Liga giants Real Madrid have on Saturday named their squad for the club’s upcoming meeting with Pachuca. Los Blancos are primed to mark their return to action tomorrow night.…

arts.ttl: Real Madrid vs Pachuca Preview: Start Time, Team News, How To Watch & Live Stream
arts.sum: Real Madrid's FIFA Club World Cup campaign continues with a Matchday 2 clash against Mexican side Pachuca on Sunday. Xabi Alonso's first match in charge of Real Madrid did not go exactly as he would have liked, with an impressive Al Hilal side earning a deserved 1-1 draw in Florida .

arts.ttl: Real Madrid Predicted Lineup vs. Pachuca: Alexander-Arnold Gets Second Chance to Impress
arts.sum: RB: Trent Alexander-Arnold —The former Liverpool star showed flashes of skill on the ball in his Real Madrid debut, but otherwise failed to impress. Trent Alexander-Arnold had a debut to forget, Fede Valverde missed what would have been the game-winning penalty and Vinícius Júnior failed to impact the game without Kylian Mbappé, who is once again expected to miss out after being hospitalized for gastroenteritis .

arts.ttl: Real Madrid pair ruled out of Pachuca clash
arts.sum: Two headline members of the first-team ranks at La Liga giants Real Madrid will play no part in the club’s next outing at the Club World Cup. That’s according to…
